title.rendered: Bright Health names Meredith Duncan as Regional Market Leader and President of its Texas Market

content.rendered: Chartwell Partners is pleased to announce that Meredith Duncan has recently joined Bright Health as Regional Market Leader and President of its Texas market. Meredith previously spent eight years with Ascension as President of Seton Insurance Company and previously as Vice President of Accountable Care and Physician Engagement. Most recently, she served as Chief Growth Officer for Aetna’s Western U.S. operations and Chief Operating Officer of its South Central Region.
